component.name: Ocean
component.definition: Definition of component type Ocean required

component.name: OceanKeyProperties
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanKeyProperties required

parameter.name: ModelFamily
parameter.definition: Type of oceanic model.

parameter.name: BasicApproximations
parameter.definition: Basic fluid dynamics approximations made in the atmospheric model.

parameter.name: ListOfPrognosticVariables
parameter.definition: List of the prognostic variables of the model.

parameter.name: EquationOfState
parameter.definition: Formulation for equation of state of sea water.

parameter.name: FreezingPoint
parameter.definition: Hypothesis on sea water freezing point.

parameter.name: FreezingPointValue
parameter.definition: Sea water freezing temperature.

parameter.name: FreezingPointComputation
parameter.definition: Method used to compute the sea water freezing temperature.

parameter.name: SpecificHeat
parameter.definition: Hypothesis on sea water specific heat.

parameter.name: SpecificHeatValue
parameter.definition: Value of the sea water specific heat.

parameter.name: SpecificHeatComputation
parameter.definition: Method used to compute the sea water specific heat.

parameter.name: RiverMouthMixing
parameter.definition: Distribution of freshwater fluxes from rivers into ocean.

parameter.name: IsolatedSeasMixing
parameter.definition: Mixing of isolated sea water with ocean.

component.name: OceanSpaceConfiguration
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanSpaceConfiguration required

parameter.name: BathymetryType
parameter.definition: Time evolution of the bathymetry - either fixed to reference date below or evolving at paleo timescales.

parameter.name: ReferenceDate
parameter.definition: Time period for which fixed bathymetry is defined.

parameter.name: BathymetryAdjustment
parameter.definition: Bathymetry adjustment performed relatively to present-day.

parameter.name: CoastalAdjustment
parameter.definition: Characteritics of the coastal adjustment.

parameter.name: StraitsClosed
parameter.definition: List of closed straits.

parameter.name: InlandSeasChanges
parameter.definition: Geographical changes for inland seas when compared to present-day.

parameter.name: BathymetryTransientChanges
parameter.definition: Characteritics of transient changes in bathymetry.

component.name: OceanHorizontalDomain
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanHorizontalDomain required

parameter.name: GridType
parameter.definition: Geometry type of the horizontal grid.

parameter.name: HorizontalDiscretization
parameter.definition: Numerical method used by the horizontal discretization scheme.

parameter.name: GridName
parameter.definition: Grid configuration name.

parameter.name: NorthPoleSingularityTreatment
parameter.definition: Method used to deal with north pole singularities.

parameter.name: MeanZonalResolution
parameter.definition: Mean zonal resolution.

parameter.name: MeanMeridionalResolution
parameter.definition: Mean meridional resolution.

parameter.name: EquatorMeridionalRefinement
parameter.definition: Meridional resolution near equator.

parameter.name: SpecialRefinement
parameter.definition: Description of any other special gid refinement (location, resolution).

parameter.name: LatMin
parameter.definition: Southern boundary of the geographical domain.

parameter.name: LatMax
parameter.definition: Northern boundary of the geographical domain.

parameter.name: LonMin
parameter.definition: Western boundary of the geographical domain.

parameter.name: LonMax
parameter.definition: Eastern boundary of the geographical domain.

parameter.name: VerticalCoordinateSystem
parameter.definition: vertical coordinate system.

parameter.name: PartialSteps
parameter.definition: Does the model use partial steps at bottom or not.

parameter.name: ReferencePressure
parameter.definition: Reference pression for S-coordinate.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevels
parameter.definition: Total number of vertical levels.

parameter.name: NumberOfLevelsInUpper100m
parameter.definition: Number of vertical levels in the upper 100 meters.

parameter.name: UpperLevel
parameter.definition: Upper level.

parameter.name: LowerLevel
parameter.definition: Lower level.

component.name: OceanNudging
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanNudging required

parameter.name: AppliedTo
parameter.definition: List of tracers to which the damping apply.

parameter.name: LatMin
parameter.definition: Southern boundary of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: LatMax
parameter.definition: Northern boundary of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: LonMin
parameter.definition: Western boundary of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: LonMax
parameter.definition: Eastern boundary of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: UpperLevel
parameter.definition: Upper level of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: LowerLevel
parameter.definition: Lower level of the tracers damping zone.

parameter.name: LatMin
parameter.definition: Southern boundary of the momentum damping zone.

parameter.name: LatMax
parameter.definition: Northern boundary of the momentum damping zone.

parameter.name: LonMin
parameter.definition: Western boundary of the momentum damping zone.

parameter.name: LonMax
parameter.definition: Eastern boundary of the momentum damping zone.

parameter.name: UpperLevel
parameter.definition: Upper level of the momentum damping zone.

parameter.name: LowerLevel
parameter.definition: Lower level of the momentum damping zone.

parameter.name: Tracers
parameter.definition: Time stepping scheme for tracers.

parameter.name: BarotropicSolver
parameter.definition: Time stepping scheme for barotropic solver.

parameter.name: BaroclinicMomentum
parameter.definition: Time stepping scheme for baroclinic momentum.

parameter.name: TimeStep
parameter.definition: Time step of the model.

component.name: OceanAdvection
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanAdvection required

parameter.name: SchemeName
parameter.definition: Commonly used name for momentum advection scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of numerical scheme used for advection of momentum.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of numerical scheme used for lateral advection of tracers.

parameter.name: MonotonicFluxLimiter
parameter.definition: Use of monotonic flux limiter for numerical stability in the lateral tracers scheme.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of numerical scheme used for vertical advection of tracers.

parameter.name: MonotonicFluxLimiter
parameter.definition: Use of monotonic flux limiter for numerical stability in the vertical tracers scheme.

component.name: OceanLateralPhysics
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanLateralPhysics required

component.name: OceanLateralPhysMomentum
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanLateralPhysMomentum required

parameter.name: Direction
parameter.definition: Type of iso-surface on which lateral diffusion of momentum is formulated.

parameter.name: Order
parameter.definition: Order of the diffusion operator used to model the lateral diffusion of momentum.

parameter.name: Discretization
parameter.definition: Discretization method applied for the lateral diffusion operator of momentum.

parameter.name: CoefficientType
parameter.definition: Property of the eddy viscosity coefficient for momentum.

parameter.name: CoefficientValue
parameter.definition: Constant value of the eddy viscosity coefficient for momentum.

constraint.name: if CoefficientType is "space varying" or "time + space varying"

parameter.name: SpatialVariation
parameter.definition: Directions along which the eddy viscosity coefficient for momentum is varying.

parameter.name: MinimalBackgroundValue
parameter.definition: Minimal background value of eddy viscosity coefficient for momentum.

component.name: OceanLateralPhysTracers
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanLateralPhysTracers required

parameter.name: MesoscaleClosure
parameter.definition: Tracers lateral scheme has a mesoscale closure implemented.

parametergroup.name: Operator
parametergroup.definition: Diffusion operator for parametrization of geostrophic eddies (first part: mixing of tracers along iso-surfaces) (???).

parameter.name: Direction
parameter.definition: Type of iso-surface on which lateral diffusion of tracers is formulated.

parameter.name: Order
parameter.definition: Order of the diffusion operator used to model the lateral diffusion of tracers.

parameter.name: Discretization
parameter.definition: Discretization method applied for the lateral diffusion operator of tracers.

parameter.name: CoefficientType
parameter.definition: Property of the eddy viscosity coefficient for tracers.

parameter.name: CoefficientValue
parameter.definition: Value of the eddy viscosity coefficient for tracers.

parameter.name: SpatialVariation
parameter.definition: Directions along which the eddy viscosity coefficient for tracers is varying.

parameter.name: BackgroundValue
parameter.definition: Background value of eddy viscosity coefficient for tracers.

parametergroup.name: Eddy-inducedVelocity
parametergroup.definition: Adiabatic re-arrangement of tracers through an advective flux (???).

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Scheme used to parametrise eddy fluxes as eddy-induced velocity (adiabatic).

value.name: GM scheme
value.definition: Gent-Mc Williams scheme for ocean eddy parametrization (adiabatic, mesoscale eddies).

parameter.name: CoefficientType
parameter.definition: Property of the coefficient for eddy-induced velocity.

parameter.name: CoefficientValue
parameter.definition: Value of the oefficient for eddy-induced velocity.

parameter.name: FluxType
parameter.definition: Formulation used for eddy-induced fluxes (???).

parameter.name: AddedDiffusivity
parameter.definition: Background added diffusivity for EIV scheme.

component.name: OceanVerticalPhysics
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanVerticalPhysics required

parameter.name: Convection
parameter.definition: Properties of ocean convection scheme.

value.name: included in the turbulence closure scheme

parameter.name: Tide-inducedMixing
parameter.definition: Impact of tides on the ocean vertical mixing.

component.name: OceanMixedLayer
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanMixedLayer required

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of scheme used for parametrization of tracers vertical mixing in the ocean mixed layer.

parameter.name: ClosureOrder
parameter.definition: Closure order of the turbulent closure scheme used for tracers vertical mixing.

parameter.name: MixingCoefficient
parameter.definition: Value of the vertical mixing coefficient for tracers in the mixed layer.

parameter.name: BackgroundCoefficient
parameter.definition: Value of the background mixing coefficient for tracers in the mixed layer.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of scheme used for parametrization of momentum vertical mixing in the ocean mixed layer.

parameter.name: ClosureOrder
parameter.definition: Closure order of the turbulent closure scheme used for momentum vertical mixing.

parameter.name: MixingCoefficient
parameter.definition: Value of the vertical mixing coefficient for momentum in the mixed layer.

parameter.name: BackgroundValue
parameter.definition: Value of the background vertical mixing coefficient for momentum in the mixed layer.

component.name: OceanInteriorMixing
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanInteriorMixing required

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of scheme used for parametrization of tracers vertical mixing in the ocean interior.

parameter.name: MixingCoefficient
parameter.definition: Value of the vertical mixing coefficient for tracers in the ocean interior.

parameter.name: BackgroundType
parameter.definition: Type of tracers background mixing coefficient used in the ocean interior.

parameter.name: BackgroundCoefficient
parameter.definition: Value of the background mixing coefficient for tracers in the ocean interior.

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of scheme used for parametrization of momentum vertical mixing in the ocean interior.

parameter.name: MixingCoefficient
parameter.definition: Value of the vertical mixing coefficient for momentum in the ocean interior.

parameter.name: BackgroundType
parameter.definition: Type of momentum background mixing coefficient used in the ocean interior.

parameter.name: BackgroundCoefficient
parameter.definition: Value of the background mixing coefficient for momentum in the ocean interior.

component.name: OceanUpAndLowBoundaries
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanUpAndLowBoundaries required

parameter.name: Type
parameter.definition: Numerical formulation for the ocean free surface.

parameter.name: Type
parameter.definition: Type of ocean bottom boundary layer.

parameter.name: LateralMixingCoefficient
parameter.definition: Value of the lateral mixing coefficient in the bottom boundary layer.

parameter.name: SillOverflow
parameter.definition: Parametrization of sill overflows.

component.name: OceanBoundaryForcing
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanBoundaryForcing required

parameter.name: BottomFriction
parameter.definition: Numerical scheme used to formulate the effect bottom friction on momentum.

value.name: non-linear (drag function of speed of tides)

parameter.name: LateralFriction
parameter.definition: Numerical scheme used to formulate the effect of lateral friction on momentum.

parameter.name: SurfaceFluxCorrection
parameter.definition: Is there any correction applied to surface fluxes of momentum?

component.name: OceanBoundForcingTracers
component.definition: Definition of component type OceanBoundForcingTracers required

parameter.name: GeothermalHeating
parameter.definition: Characteristics of the geothermal forcing at ocean bottom.

parameter.name: SurfaceFluxCorrections
parameter.definition: Is there any correction applied to surface fluxes of heat and/or salt?

parameter.name: SchemeType
parameter.definition: Type of physical scheme used to formulate sunlight penetration into ocean.

parameter.name: FirstDepth
parameter.definition: Fisrt extinction depth of the ocean sunlight penetration scheme.

parameter.name: SecondDepth
parameter.definition: Second extinction depth of the ocean sunlight penetration scheme.

parameter.name: ThirdDepth
parameter.definition: Third extinction depth of the ocean sunlight penetration scheme.

parameter.name: OceanColorDependent
parameter.definition: Is sunlight penetration dependant of ocean color? (i.e. Is interaction of incident light with substances particules present in ocean water taken into account?).

parameter.name: FromAtmosphere
parameter.definition: Way to formulate the impact of precipitation/evaporation on sea surface salinity.

parameter.name: FromSeaIce
parameter.definition: Way to formulate the impact of sea-ice formation/melting on sea surface salinity.

parameter.name: FromRiver
parameter.definition: Way to formulate the impact of river discharge on sea surface salinity.
